Posts.EditableText: We don't really have any decent Q5 sample games at the moment. Would anybody like to volunteer to write one? It should be reasonably small but try to demonstrate as many of the major features as possible - custom commands, verbs, attributes, video etc.
Posts.HTML: We don't really have any decent Q5 sample games at the moment. Would anybody like to volunteer to write one? It should be reasonably small but try to demonstrate as many of the major features as possible - custom commands, verbs, attributes, video etc.

Posts.EditableText: Hey !!! Don't agree with that !!! There's a some decent game in QUEST 5. A very decent game. But in spanish, of course !!!. It's called: "[b:vgsijiqv]NEARCO II (REMAKE)- LA PERDICIÓN DE LA NINFA[/b:vgsijiqv]". [url:vgsijiqv]http://www.caad.es/fichas/nearco-ii-remake-la-perdicion-de-la-ninfa.html[/url:vgsijiqv]
